title: Dan Patrick - Hour 1 - Nets blow lead, lose in Boston
itunes:title: Dan Patrick - Hour 1 - Nets blow lead, lose in Boston
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins filling in for Dan, they discuss the Nets blowing a 17-pt lead in Game 2 of their series against the Celtics.  Doug and Ryan talk about Joel Embiid and his game-winner in Toronto as the Sixers took a commanding 3-0 series lead over the Raptors, as well as a discussion about Sixers' star James Harden.  The guys react to Deebo Samuel's request for a trade from the 49ers.  #DougGottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
